amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out programs in Cuba in contravention of the National Security Presidential Memorandum prohibiting transactions with entities owned, controlled, or operated by or on behalf of military intelligence or security services of Cuba.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3364 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3364 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4714; text: CR S4714) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out programs in Cuba in contravention of the National Security Presidential Memorandum prohibiting transactions with entities owned, controlled, or operated by or on behalf of military intelligence or security services of Cuba.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3364 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3364 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3224.
